name: Dojo Sim
description:
Play the role of a teacher in a martial arts dojo.  Sign up students, or reject students who want to train at your dojo.  This is a  simple proof of concept for a dialogue system and pathfinding system.  Try to get your dojo skill level to 4.0 or more by 7 months to win!   You lose by running out of funds - the rental space is $1000/month.  Students fee is $150 per month.

I have more ideas for adding some in-game events like guest instructor seminars and student challenges to add some variety to the gameplay.
